reference.shortdesc: An example helps to illustrate the subject of the topic or a portion of the topic.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Use example to contain both sample code (or similar artifacts) and the discussion that illustrates the sample. For example, a DITA topic about programming code could use the example element to contain both the sample code and the text that describes the code. Similarly, a sample that included preformatted text might use the pre element along with a paragraph or list to elaborate upon sections of that text.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock:
ADD

New database records are created using the ADD command.

The following example illustrates the creation of a new record. All parameter settings are strictly optional.

01 OPTIONS ABC,ADD,DEF,HIJK,LMNO,AOW=25000,HF=2
